scripts.start-server-prod: cd server && yarn install && node index.js
scripts.start-client-prod: cd client && yarn install && yarn start
scripts.start-prod: npm install && concurrently "npm run start-server-prod" "npm run start-client-prod"
scripts.start-server-dev: cd server && yarn install && nodemon index.js
scripts.start-client-dev: cd client && yarn install && yarn start
